snippet.title: Title: Higgs bundles and surface group representations in the real symplectic group
snippet.description:
Title: Higgs bundles and surface group representations in the real symplectic group
Authors: Oscar Garcia-Prada (CSIC, Madrid), Peter B. Gothen (Universidade do Porto), Ignasi Mundet i Riera (Universitat de Barcelona)
Comments: 55 pages; v2: main results are unchanged but paper has been completely reorganized and presentation significantly improved; v3, v4: various corrections and improvements; Part 1 of v2 has been split off as the independent paper arXiv:0909.4487v1 [math.DG]
Subjects: Algebraic Geometry (math.AG); Differential Geometry (math.DG)
